paragraphs.body: Um, a while back, I made a category of the exact same name with the exact same content, but it was deleted for lack of pages. Why has it been recreated?Aangzula 17:35, September 3, 2011 (UTC)
paragraphs.text: Um, a while back, I made a category of the exact same name with the exact same content, but it was deleted for lack of pages. Why has it been recreated?Aangzula 17:35, September 3, 2011 (UTC)

paragraphs.body: Yeah...looks like it's came back again, and this time has more community support than the time before even with the Fire Nation Royal Family information being set up. Feel free to challenge it via the Forum:War Room. I'm still vague/deciding on where I stand on this. Vulmen (talk • contribs) 15:58, September 17, 2011 (UTC)
